Text:
My apologies everyone.
After my brief session of seeding this today my computer I use for downloading/seeding broke down... again (HP is nothing but crap).
Fortunately it seems some people had time to get the whole thing so this shouldn't be a major problem.

I WILL start seeding again as soon as I've reinstalled that machine. Which I will do tomorrow, since it's getting kind of late.
I'm back seeding as of today. After several reinstalls I finally got the comp working decently... for now.

d'ont work in xp ??? the game start but there is no image just i heard the sound

Great, great upload NeverRAR, thanks. That said, I have the same problem as tikimiw: GK3 doesn't load in WinXP, I just hear the sound from the presentation, but there's no image.

Unlike Kmaster, I don't consider it to be a "noobs" mistake. It's a compatibility issue that cannot be easily solved by using Windows' compatibility mode or a solution of that sort. But hey, everyone's welcomed here... uploaders and jackasses alike. Thanks for your help ;)

Kinda solved GK3's compatibility problems: try uninstalling your video codecs and then running the game. I know, it's a high price to pay and I'm sure there's an easier way, but if you are as impatient as I am... :P
